aboutDescription: KhetMitra is a digital platform that makes land leasing in agriculture simple, safe, and transparent. Many landowners cannot farm their land due to age, jobs, or living in cities, while skilled farmers struggle to find land for cultivation.
policy1Description: Your data is protected with state-of-the-art encryption and security protocols.
policy2Description: We promote eco-friendly and sustainable practices for a healthier planet.
policy3Description: Our policies ensure transparent and fair pricing for all farmers and partners.
role1Description: This refers to individuals who own land and allow others to cultivate it. KisanMitra offers a pathway to register your land for farming support, connecting with agricultural experts.
role2Description: This role involves tasks such as starting ground, handling, comprehending productivity through careful planning and hard work. Focuses on efficient and productive management of agricultural activities.
role3Description: These individuals work with dedication. Their responsibilities include harvesting and management of the crops, indicating their direct involvement in cultivation, harvesting, and post-harvest management.
